title: #92Noon!  Boudreau/Miller/Birk
description: PA & Nordo are once again live from TCO Performance Center!  Bruce Boudreau joins the show to talk about the Wild's recent win streak, and provide some injury updates.  Dan Miller, the radio voice of the Detroit Lions, calls in to talk about the Vikings/Lions match up this Sunday.  Matt Burke is on location TCO to talk about the red hot Ravens. Not to mention, the debut of a new segment and some Timberwolves talk!
